block_comment: This block initializes several arrays used for defining different parameters of a digital system. It does this by assigning a specific string value to the array indices at simulation start-up. Each array represents different categories such as rates, laws, operations, types, and models, and each category can take predetermined values. For instance, `rates` can have values like "40", "32", "24", "16"; `laws` can be "AA", "MM", "AM", "MA"; `operations` can be "nrm", "ovr", "i"; `types` can be classified as "reset" or "homing"; and `models` can be either "enc" for encoder or "dec" for decoder.
